reviewText: I'm very excited this movie is on DVD.  I've had the tv recorded copy since it originally played.  Corderaeu is great! :) Glad to find the movie, get a great deal, and have great customer service.
Everybody wants to be like Mike! Even in retirement, he is still a classic!

Michael Jordan:An American Hero is about the Greatest Of All-Time player in the NBA from his days as a struggling athlete into becoming a 6-time NBA Champion as part of the Chicago Bulls when he became the most iconic basketball player in the world. Too bad that this TV movie has budget limitations and it is so simplistic that marketing brands that Jordan was identified to wasn't used at all in it. But in spite of it,it did the best it could to provide an average story of the NBA legend within its means possible despite there is nothing new in it that an average NBA fan already knew before watching it.
If you like basketball you'll like this book as well. Its a great read and very interesting as well. Thanks.
I was very pleased when I viewed this story and I really enjoyed everything about the greatest basketball player in our present generation!
Nice to have known a little more of the Superstar's life of Michael Jordan.  Purchased this DVD (used) with no glitches or skipping.
My son loves it in his room. It's a great addition to his MJ collection. Arrived in perfect time when we were changing his room around.
If you are a fan to this guy, don't losse this item you remember his moments in the same way was be years ago. Spectacular plays, from spectacular player ever.
